text: Stripe manages and holds all card data submitted through Condo Control; we do not hold any payment card data.

However, we may use client data in aggregate to understand any prevailing usage patterns or needs of our customers.
We will use that information as part of our product development process to create new or enhance existing features and services.
We enable and use two-factor authentication wherever possible for back-end services used by Condo Control and it is also available for anyone who is accessing our platform.
Azure provides both our primary server environment as well as our failovers.
Whenever an end-user accesses Condo Control, we record their IP address so that we can identify where the request came from.

For example, we will use your personal information to verify your identity, as required by PIPEDA, when you contact us with a request to make sure it is really you.
